data.name: FSX Steam Edition: US Cities X: Cleveland Add-On
data.detailed_description:
US Cities X: Cleveland from Aerosoft with an aerial image detailed to 15cm per pixel and includes more than 640 major buildings modeled, 45,000 realistically placed autogen buildings, four helipads and eight airports including Cleveland Burke Lakefront Airport and Cleveland Hopkins International Airport. Take off from one of the last downtown airports in the US and test your abilities as a pilot doing some island hopping on the Lake Erie Islands.

For pilots, Cleveland is among the most fascinating cities in the US. Unlike Chicago, it still has a lakefront airport that is so insanely close to downtown that an approach there offers quite a lot for your eyes, whether it's the Browns Stadium, the Science Museum's wind turbine or the Lakeshore power plant that are just a few feet from the glideslope or the stunning views of the skyscrapers and the many bridges crossing the Cuyahoga River. Last but not least, the Lakefront Airport is well-known for the annual Cleveland National Air Show that takes place there.

Features:

  • Aerial image coverage with up to 15cm/pix resolution.
  • Bonus: Complete island hopping scenery covering the US Lake Erie Islands!
  • More than 640 major buildings included.
  • 45,935 autogen objects placed realistically.
  • Highly detailed and customised mesh terrain.
  • Many detailed bridges with traffic crossing the Cuyahoga River.
  • Four heliports in good detail.
  • Major airports in and around the city as well as the islands are covered with new high res ground images with customised mesh terrain (no new building structures added):
    • KBKL - Cleveland Burke Lakefront Airport.
    • KCLE - Cleveland Hopkins International Airport.
    • KCGF - Cuyahoga County Airport.
    • 89D - Kelley’s Island Field Airport.
    • 3W2 - Put-In-Bay Airport.
    • 3T7 - Middle Bass Island Airport.
    • 3W9 - Middle Bass Island East Point.
    • 58OH - Rattlesnake Island.
    • 3X5 - North Bass Island.
  • Sound effects like downtown and highway traffic and animated gulls.
  • Animated ship traffic and ferries between the islands.
  • Traffic on most major roads.
  • Perry Nuclear Power Plant with helipad and animated smoke that turns in the wind direction.

fullgame.name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core).
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible.
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.
